request.lesson_description: The structure and functions of cell organelles, including the nucleus, mitochondria, chloroplasts, and more.
request.additional_guidance: Focus on the role of each organelle in maintaining cell function and include examples from both plant and animal cells. Emphasize the differences between prokaryotic and eukaryotic cells.
